page.title: 03NOTABLE EVENTS
page.content: During 1980-81 a by-pass was constructed to avoid Everton village.The village was also enlarged with the addition of an estate of bungalows.This area continues to expand as two further estates of houses are in the process of being built. On 16th November,1985 the new Safeways Hypermarket will be opened in Lymington.This year also saw the construction of a roundabout at the Pennington Cross crossroads. Two more housing estates are being built in Everton.Everton Grange,an old people's home,and its adjoining land is being used for a development of luxury homes.The Newlands Manor Estate,a large area of private homes is being extended.
